Sorry I havn't replied earier. I havn't had internet access for the last
week or so and I'm now at Defcon.

The source for the original Gladiator (not BF) was indeed released to
everyone under the GPL. If you want it, download the latest from CVS. The
very latest doesn't compile cause I accidently committed sound code that
was halfway through being finished.

However, before I accidently committed that, the code compiled and worked.
The game works great under Linux except for sound, joystick, and some ai.
I don't know if it compiled under any other OS. As for sound, that
probably won't get done until after I get back from Defcon.

A new graphics system would be pretty tough. Odo
(aglswapbuffers@...) is in charge of that area, so anyone that
wants to help should contact him.

As for the site, our webmaster has been on vacation and didn't set the
permissions right, so we couldn't update the site. He's coming back soon
and will update.


- Zardus
